Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Nice picture, four 3d glasses (include one clip for your glass), okay 3d, okay speaker, very urgly remote controller. Very good price as I brought at huge discount.

Reviews.Title: Good Value, Nice Sound and Picture
Reviews.Author: Abbas
Reviews.Content: Bought this from a competitor for 430$ three months ago. It is very good value, 3D is good, sound is loud and clear and the 5 HDMI ports are just fantastic!The only thing is that I used to watch Samsung LEDs all the time and the picture on this is not as good as the Samsung, but it is also half the price!

Reviews.Title: I Loved it but
Reviews.Author: rick
Reviews.Content: there was a wrinkle in the screen and it was the only one they had at the time  but I would recommend

Reviews.Title: Very Good TV
Reviews.Author: C. Sanders
Reviews.Content: High quality TV; a lot of bang for your bucks. The outside of the set is very attractive. I have another 3D television that is 240 MHZ and the 3D effects on this set are as good (which is very good). Remote is uncluttered with many, easy-to-use, simple features.You can't go wrong with this bargain.

Reviews.Title: I would not recommend it
Reviews.Author: G. Fridman
Reviews.Content: Overall good picture quality and very BAD Sound!!!Start having Problems after 2 years with screen, looks like its going to end life soon.I would not recommend it

ProductInfo.Features:
Sleek & Slim 46 LED Class 1080P HDTV
5 x HDMI Port, USB Port
ATSC/NTSC/Clear QAM
60 Hz Refresh Rate
Wall mountable 400 x 400 VESA Standard
ProductInfo.Name: Sceptre E465BV-FHDD 46-Inch 3D 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Glossy black)
